introduction: Hi, I am Varun Reddy. I am a web developer. I am currently pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering. I am passionate about coding and I love to learn new things.

projects.name: Tires on Highways
projects.description: A web application analyzes tire conditions through images captured at toll plazas, achieving 85% accuracy in detecting worn-out or unsafe tires. It alerts vehicle owners via SMS, contributing to improved road safety.

projects.name: Tech for Autism and Dyslexia
projects.description: Leading the development of interactive games for children with Autism and Dyslexia. Built a website for parents, therapists, doctors, and centers to view and manage children's reports, successfully digitizing 95% of handwritten reports and game data and enhancing report accessibility and management.

projects.name: Petrol Tracker
projects.description: A petrol tracking app that lets users log bike readings, fuel details, and monitor mileage, total kilometers, and expenses. It also features insightful graphs for performance analysis.

achievements: Google Cloud Computing Foundations and Generative AI certificate
Contributed to open source in GirlScript Summer of Code 2024
Certified as a Postman API Fundamentals Student Expert
